Latitude.description: The measure of the angular distance on the meridean north or south of the equator.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the main phone number for the person.

language.description: The language in which the name is represented.

First.description: The first name or given name of the person.

Middle.description: The middle name of the person.

Prefix.description: Salutation for the person (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Dr., etc.)

Suffix.description: A suffix related to the name (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Esq., etc.).

Title.description: Specifies degrees or honors of the person (e.g. M.D., Ph.D., etc.).

LastNamePrefix.description: Specifies the last name prefix (e.g. \"Van der\", \"von\", \"de\", etc.).

CurrencyCode.description: An ISO 4217 alpha character code used to specify the monetary unit.

decimalPlaces.description: An ISO 4201 \"minor unit\" typically used when an amount is sent without the decimal places to specify where the decimal should be placed (e.g. 2500 USD with 2 minor units would represent $25.00)

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary email address for the person.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary method for communication for this individual.

Reference.description: The reference object is used to identify an item related to but not contained within this transaction (e,g. identifies a check that is associated to another check).

name.description: Specifies the type of reference (e.g. stall number, counter number, table tent number, etc.)

sourceSystem.description: Specifies the system from which the ID originated.

Tip.description: An optional addition to the payment to reward good service.

Gratuity.description: A mandatory addition to the check for service.

TenderDescription.description: Provides information regarding the tender type.

AuthorizationCode.description: The code returned by the authorization system.

LastFour.description: The last four digits of a credit\/debit card.

FirstSix.description: The first six digits of a credit\/debit card.

AccountNumber.description: Specifies account information for tender types other than credit cards.

tenderPresenceInd.description: When true, the payment method was present at the transaction location.

depositInd.description: When true, this payment is applied as a deposit (e.g. for a reservation or future order).
